_doc: Manual overrides for Polymarket ↔ ESPN team matching. Two separate namespaces.
_doc_title: title_school_overrides: normalized market team name variants → schoolToken. Bypasses mascot stripping. Key is descriptive; 'variants' array has normalized strings to match, 'target' is the output schoolToken.
_doc_outcome: outcome_team_overrides: normalized outcome fragment → ESPN team fragment. Applied as word-boundary replace. Keys must be ≥2 words.
